name: Vitale #39
description: Your 1 carat Fancy Deep Brown diamond is a unique and captivating gemstones with a warm and rich colour. The brown hue in your diamond is attributed to the presence of nitrogen and structural anomalies during its  formation process. Natural radiation exposure may also play a role in the development of the brown colour. Brown is often associated with warmth, earthiness, and stability. Your Fancy Deep Brown diamond may symbolise a connection to nature and a sense of grounded elegance.
